reviewText: This gift was for a friend, but the friend did not receive the product listed. Rather than being an A/B/C region disc, they instead received an exclusively Region B disc. This prevented my friend from watching it on their player (they have a Region A player). I'd previously bought this product for myself from a different vendor, and I correctly received the expected Region A/B/C disc. This was a very disappointing purchase.
Great martial arts non stop action only thing is star johnny yung Bosch gets hit constantly and spits up blood but keeps going and pounds the bad guys other than that martial arts greatness
